attributes.action: Not interfere in the housing market market
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The government must not interfere with the natural correction of the housing market and allow prices to find there natural level as quickly as possible.  Sensible savers and taxpayers should not subsidise the financial and construction industries and buyers of the last few year should be willing to accept market risks.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
